metadata.title: 18th Foundation Day 2026 | Shivalik College of Engineering
metadata.description: Shivalik College of Engineering celebrated its 18th Foundation Day on 2nd February 2026, honoring the birthday of Chairman Shri Sunil Kumar Ji with gratitude and renewed commitment to excellence.

introduction.heading: A Day of Gratitude and Reflection
content: Shivalik College of Engineering marked its 18th Foundation Day on 2nd February 2026, on the birthday of our Honourable Chairman, Shri Sunil Kumar Ji, in an atmosphere of gratitude, reflection, and renewed purpose. The day stood as a reminder of the institution's journey, values, and commitment to shaping responsible professionals.

sections.heading: Sacred Beginnings
content: The celebrations began on an auspicious note with a hawan, symbolizing harmony, positive intent, and collective well-being. Faculty members, staff, and students gathered to seek blessings for the continued growth of the institution and success of its academic community.
The spiritual ceremony reflected Shivalik's belief in balancing modern education with timeless values.

sections.heading: Leadership and Vision
content: Under the leadership of Shri Sunil Kumar Ji, the institution has steadily evolved, earning trust for its academic standards, industry-oriented approach, and focus on holistic development.

The day concluded with a sense of unity and optimism, reinforcing Shivalik College of Engineering's commitment to excellence in education and its mission to nurture future-ready professionals grounded in strong ethical values.

mission.heading: Our Commitment
points: Balancing modern education with timeless values
